post.description:
Authenticate user with email and password.
Returns JWT access token.

patch.description:
Update current authenticated user's profile.
Can update: name, phone, avatar

post.description:
Refresh access token.
Returns a new JWT access token.

Logout endpoint (client-side token removal).
This is a placeholder - JWT tokens are stateless.
Client should remove the token from storage.

get.description:
List all users with pagination and filters.
Requires ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users Get

post.description:
Create a new user.
Non-super-admins can only create users for their own company.

get.description: Get total count of users matching filters.
Get a specific user by ID.

delete.description:
Soft delete a user (set isActive=False).
Cannot delete yourself.

get.description:
List companies.
SUPER_ADMIN can see all companies.
Others can only see their own company.

schema.title: Response List Companies Api V1 Companies Get

post.description:
Create a new company.
Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.

get.description: Get total count of companies. Requires SUPER_ADMIN.
Get a specific company by ID.

patch.description:
Update a company.
SUPER_ADMIN can update any company.
ADMIN can update their own company (limited fields).

delete.description:
Soft delete a company (set isActive=False).
Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.

get.description:
List locations.
Filtered by company and user's location access.

schema.title: Response List Locations Api V1 Locations Get

post.description: Create a new location. Requires ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

get.description: Get a specific location by ID.

patch.description: Update a location. Requires ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

delete.description: Soft delete a location. Requires ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

schema.title: Response List Zones Api V1 Locations  Location Id  Zones Get

post.description: Create a new zone in a location.

schema.title: Response List Bins Api V1 Locations  Location Id  Zones  Zone Id  Bins Get

post.description: Create a new bin in a zone.

get.description:
List SKUs with pagination and filters.
Filtered by company.

schema.title: Response List Skus Api V1 Skus Get

post.description: Create a new SKU. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get total count of SKUs matching filters.
Get a specific SKU by ID.

patch.description: Update a SKU. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

delete.description: Soft delete a SKU. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description:
List inventory records with pagination and filters.
Filtered by company via location.

schema.title: Response List Inventory Api V1 Inventory Get

post.description: Create a new inventory record. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get total count of inventory records matching filters.
Get inventory summary grouped by SKU.

schema.title: Response Get Inventory Summary Api V1 Inventory Summary Get

get.description: Get a specific inventory record by ID.

patch.description: Update an inventory record. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

delete.description: Delete an inventory record. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

post.description:
Adjust inventory quantity (add or subtract).
Requires MANAGER or higher role.

Transfer inventory between bins.
Requires MANAGER or higher role.

schema.title: Response Transfer Inventory Api V1 Inventory Transfer Post

get.description:
List orders with pagination and filters.
Filtered by company via location.

schema.title: Response List Orders Api V1 Orders Get

post.description: Create a new order. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get total count of orders matching filters.
Get a specific order by ID.

patch.description: Update an order. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get an order by order number.

post.description: Cancel an order. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: List items for a specific order.

schema.title: Response List Order Items Api V1 Orders  Order Id  Items Get

post.description: Add an item to an order. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

patch.description: Update an order item. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

delete.description: Delete an order item. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: List deliveries for a specific order.

schema.title: Response List Deliveries Api V1 Orders  Order Id  Deliveries Get

post.description: Create a delivery for an order. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

patch.description: Update a delivery. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get a delivery by AWB number.

List customers with pagination and filters.
Filtered by company.

schema.title: Response List Customers Api V1 Customers Get

post.description: Create a new customer. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

get.description: Get total count of customers matching filters.
Get summary of credit usage across all customers.
Get a specific customer by ID.

patch.description: Update a customer. Requires MANAGER or higher role.

delete.description: Soft delete a customer (set status to INACTIVE). Requires ADMIN or higher role.

post.description:
Adjust customer credit (add or subtract).
Requires MANAGER or higher role.

schema.title: Response List Customer Groups Api V1 Customers Groups Get

post.description: Create a new customer group. Requires ADMIN or higher role.

get.description: Get a specific customer group by ID.

patch.description: Update a customer group. Requires ADMIN or higher role.

delete.description: Soft delete a customer group. Requires ADMIN or higher role.

get.description: List outreach attempts for an NDR.

get.description: List AI actions for an NDR.

schema.title: Response List Ai Actions Api V1 Ndr  Ndr Id  Ai Actions Get
